person.persName: Theodore Kohlhass, Sr. (Clark County, Kentucky, accountant and politician)

body.p: Clark County, Kentucky, accountant and politician. Kentucky native. Son of Henry Kohlhass and Prudence Kohlhass. Father of Henry W. Kohlhass, McElroy Kohlhass, Julia Kohlhass, and Theodore Kohlhass, Jr. Grocer in Clark County in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in 1850. Assistant clerk of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1839 to 1847. Prinicpal clerk of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1847 to 1852. Member of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Clark County from 1853 to 1857. Accountant in Winchester, Kentucky, in 1860.
